textContent:
Props are smaller objects that, in most cases, should be used by more people than just the guild leaders. These range from small things like torches, and bigger things like barrels, barricades, crates, tables, chairs, etc. 

Props, while inactive, are stored in the player's inventory like a normal item. Players can only carry 1 stack of these items at a time (torches stack up to 10, barrels up to 1, etc). 

The procedure for placing them is as simple as using a spell with an area target and choosing the location (5yd range). MAYBE add the option to change orientation of the object if it's too impractical. 

IMPORTANT:
title: Prop placement
textContentHtml:
Props are smaller objects that, in most cases, should be used by more people than just the guild leaders. These range from small things like torches, and bigger things like barrels, barricades, crates, tables, chairs, etc. 


Props, while inactive, are stored in the player's inventory like a normal item. Players can only carry 1 stack of these items at a time (torches stack up to 10, barrels up to 1, etc). 


The procedure for placing them is as simple as using a spell with an area target and choosing the location (5yd range). MAYBE add the option to change orientation of the object if it's too impractical.
